short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces pro-abortion words with more accurate terminology

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces "politically correct" pro-abortion terminology with terminology that reflects the fact that what is growing inside a pregnant woman is a life, a baby.  Examples of words replaced:
Pro-choice -> Pro-murder
Abortion -> Infanticide
Anti-choice -> Pro-life
